Finding files in ADLS2 using dbutils and sparksql


As per our archetecture we provide data files to different client in Avro, ORC, Parquet and CSV format. each day we generate more than 50 files in each run.

ADLS2 has few limitation when it comes to do manual search of files based on name, date or size or combination of same in web portal as well as Storage explorer for Desktop

below work in progress article is showing small solution we used to read files metadata from ADLS2 using functionality of dbutils and sparksql in case of debugging needed for old files that is not easily searchable in portal or storage explorer.

Article is work in progress and will be soon up in linkedin, same link will be added here for reading.
